cat << 'ENDOFFILE' > train_and_predict.py
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestRegressor, GradientBoostingRegressor
from sklearn.linear_model import Ridge, Lasso
from sklearn.preprocessing import OneHotEncoder, StandardScaler
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.metrics import mean_squared_error
import xgboost as xgb
import lightgbm as lgb
from scipy.stats import mode
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')
validation_df = pd.read_csv('data/validation.csv')

# Separate features and target
X_train = train_df.drop(['Id', 'SalePrice'], axis=1)
y_train = train_df['SalePrice']
X_test = test_df.drop(['Id'], axis=1)
X_val = validation_df.drop(['Id', 'SalePrice'], axis=1)
y_val = validation_df['SalePrice']

# Identify categorical and numerical columns
categorical_columns = X_train.select_dtypes(include=['object']).columns.tolist()
numerical_columns = X_train.select_dtypes(include=[np.number]).columns.tolist()

# Feature engineering: create year-related features
X_train['Age'] = X_train['YrSold'] - X_train['YearBuilt']
X_train['RemodAge'] = X_train['YrSold'] - X_train['YearRemodAdd']
X_test['Age'] = X_test['YrSold'] - X_test['YearBuilt']
X_test['RemodAge'] = X_test['YrSold'] - X_test['YearRemodAdd']
X_val['Age'] = X_val['YrSold'] - X_val['YearBuilt']
X_val['RemodAge'] = X_val['YrSold'] - X_val['YearRemodAdd']

# Feature engineering: total area features
X_train['TotalArea'] = X_train['1stFlrSF'] + X_train['2ndFlrSF'] + X_train['LowQualFinSF'] + X_train['GrLivArea']
X_test['TotalArea'] = X_test['1stFlrSF'] + X_test['2ndFlrSF'] + X_test['LowQualFinSF'] + X_test['GrLivArea']
X_val['TotalArea'] = X_val['1stFlrSF'] + X_val['2ndFlrSF'] + X_val['LowQualFinSF'] + X_val['GrLivArea']

# Feature engineering: basement-related feature
